type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.buildcomparison.gradle.GradleBuildInvocationSpec
type.description: A specification for launching a Gradle build with a specified Gradle version.

method.name: getArguments
method.description:
The command line arguments (excluding tasks) to invoke the build with.

returns:The command line arguments (excluding tasks) to invoke the build with.

method.name: getGradleVersion
method.description:
The Gradle version to run the build with. Defaults to the current Gradle version of the running build.

returns:The Gradle version to run the build with. Never null.

method.name: getProjectDir
method.description:
The “root” directory of the build. Defaults to the current build's root directory.

returns:The “root” project directory of the build. Never null.

method.name: getTasks
method.description:
The tasks to execute. Defaults to an empty list.

returns:The tasks to execute.

method.name: setArguments
method.description:
Sets the command line arguments (excluding tasks) to invoke the build with.
param:arguments The command line arguments (excluding tasks) to invoke the build with.

method.name: setGradleVersion
method.description:
Sets the Gradle version to run the build with. The value must be a valid, published, Gradle version number. Examples are:
  • "1.1"
  • "1.0-rc-1"

param:gradleVersion The Gradle version to run the build with.

method.name: setProjectDir
method.description:
Sets the “root” directory of the build. This should not be the project directory of child project in a multi project build. It should always be the root of the multiproject build. The value is interpreted as a file as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:projectDir The “root” directory of the build.

method.name: setTasks
method.description:
Sets the tasks to execute.
param:tasks The tasks to execute.

property.name: arguments
property.description:
The command line arguments (excluding tasks) to invoke the build with.

returns:The command line arguments (excluding tasks) to invoke the build with.

property.name: gradleVersion
property.description:
The Gradle version to run the build with. Defaults to the current Gradle version of the running build.

returns:The Gradle version to run the build with. Never null.

property.name: projectDir
property.description:
The “root” directory of the build. Defaults to the current build's root directory.

returns:The “root” project directory of the build. Never null.

property.name: tasks
property.description:
The tasks to execute. Defaults to an empty list.

returns:The tasks to execute.
